text:
<fo:block>some words ...
<fo:block>inner first</fo:block>
<fo:block>inner 2nd</fo:block>
<fo:block>inner 3rd</fo:block>
<fo:block>inner 4th</fo:block>
</fo:block>

results in:

some words ...
inner first
some words ...
inner 2nd
some words ...
inner 3rd
some words ...
inner 4th
some words ...

How can that be?

Regards,

Joachim Unger
